# David Howard Saunders

|birth_place         = Fairport, Michigan, U.S.
|death_date          =
|office              = Member of the Florida House of Representatives from St. Lucie County
|term_start          = 1945

David Howard Saunders (July 16, 1890 â€“ March 4, 1980), nicknamed "Banty", was an American politician. He served as a Democratic member of the Florida House of Representatives.
Life and career
Saunders was born in Fairport, Michigan.  He was a lay reader.
Saunders served in the Florida House of Representatives from 1945 to 1951.
Saunders died on March 4, 1980, at the age of 89.
